review: I had right knee joint pain for over 10years, I had visited several doctors..but unfortunately their diagnosis were very wrong, so much so one had told me to do open heart surgery as, as per that guy 'I was having steptococcus virus in my joints and it also had affected my heart'..but the results of tests to surely know were all negetive..at a point of time I was so frustrated I completely stopped seeing any doctor. Then much much later, recently I contacted one of my school friend Dr. Arindam Mukherjee and he recommended Dr. D.K. Das and to my surprise he cured my knee pain in a week by administering a type of injection (I don't know the name)!! I am so grateful to him and his team, thank you!!!😀😀🙏🙏🙏

VERY ETHICAL  AND GENUINE DOCTOR ..HIS APPROACH IS TOTALLY NON COMMERCIALLY   .... Thank you Dr Das because of you my husband could walk   after such massive accident .let me describe .. My husband had a bad accident and injured his knee with complicated fracture .. Dr Das was very kind to see him on Sunday and advised us very genuinely ...he wants to try with plaster rather than surgery ..Though he is a very renowned surgeon .. this shows his honesty towards a patient ... I would suggest everybody  for any orthopedic problem one should visit him .. he has magic in his hands .. specially knee replacement surgery .. his team members are very cooperative .. I would recommend him always for ortho problem ... IT IS RARE TO FIND SUCH KIND HEARTED DOCTOR IN THIS MORDEN WORLD 🙏🙏
reply_text: Thank you so much for your genuine appreciation 🙏🙏🙏

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I visited the doctor this winter and asked about the pain in my knees. The doctor was very polite and explained to me in detail the reason why I was facing the pain issue. He also suggested me some medicines and lifestyle modifications that help me recover from my knee pain faster and sooner. 

I will always recommend Dr. D. K. Das to everyone facing any problem related to bones and joints.
reply_text: Thank you Shristi for your kind words ..

review: Went for treatment of frozen shoulder. Was administered an injection worth Rs 5000/-. When I asked about the injection, the doc as well his staff flatly refused to give out the name of the injection. **** *********** ******* ***** *** ********* ******* ***** **** *** * ******* ****** *** ***** *** ** **** ****** Every patient has a right to know what medicines he's being prescribed.
reply_text: We are sorry to say there must have been some communication gap .. defiantly you have the right to ask the name of the injection and we will let you know .. Doctor will be happy to tel you in detail whatever quairy you have .. please try to have some faith in doctors ... as they are taking care of your pain and saving lives in this pandemic where everybody is staying at home 🙏🙏🙏

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had pain in both my elbows for 7-8 months. The problem was diagnosed in my first visit itself. Not only that it was explained to me by the doctor so that I could understand the treatment being given. Just one week later I am 90% recovered. I am extremely satisfied and happy that I visited Dr Das for my treatment. The entire staff is extremely helpful as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I Was Told By Another Doctor, That it would be A Long Procedure and Rehabilitation Lengthy, BUT DESPITE A BROKEN PATELA( Knee Cap into 8+pcs), I Was Operated Within 3 Hours of Injury, Sent Home in 24 Hours, Was Able To Walk Unaided in 8 Weeks. Truly An Angel Doctor With A Divine Touch.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words .. Your genuine appreciation means a lot to us .. 🙏

review: Happy to have consulted  Dr. Das. Excellent Doctor with good explanation and resolution. I would recommend Dr. Das for all joint pain

Dr. DK Das is friendly but ** ** ********** *** *** **** ******. What I disliked is he tried to make us come for second visit and did not give solution at the first visit. Gives multiple painkillers to reduce pain immediately, *** **** *** ** ** *** **** ** *** ******* *** ***** *** The only good thing he suggested was the blood test, but he didn't even bother to give meds ********* ***** ***** Not visiting him again for consultation.
The Doctor was very calm and soft spoken.He listens to patients and give remedies instantly.** ** ************* *** the way he give solutions to problems that tremendous.i recommend the doctor
Extremely kind and quick to address problem and suggest resolution, Patient can feel confident and start recovery thanks to such pleasing and helpful insights ..I highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went to the clinic for lower back pain that I have been experiencing from sometime. Got relieved in a week. Specially, the physiotherapy by Dr. Shalini helped a lot and the way she explains the problem and solution. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was really nice experience with the doctor as he  has rightly diagnose the problem. He explained it thoroughly about the problem . He his very humble and understand the problem. Very good experience and highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor was really cordial and explained the pros and cons  of the knne replacement surgery to my mom. Conducive environment

Went to doctor for knee pain. He gave 5-6 tablets in morning and evening. Also suggested to get physiotherapy sessions from his clinic at additional costs per day for around 15days. The list of medicines didn’t help at all and after 15days doctor started suggesting to go for some injections. I didn’t feel it right and felt like it was for other benefits and not helping patient. I went to other doctors *** **** **** **** ********* ********** **** *** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The way Dr.Das helped me to understand reason for my shoulder pain and the way he explained all the medicine and there benefit made a great impact. His friendly nature makes a patient relax.

Dr.Shalini (physio) did her work excellently making me comfortable. She is great at her work, very polite in nature and friendly.
She explained all the necessary precautions I need to take while doing my exercises and the correct posture for each exercise.

I visited the doctor for my knee pain I am fully satisfied with the treatment and as well as his behavior he is v.humble and generous Doctor I have recommended my cousin for the spine pain even he is also satisfied I would like to recommend him to more persons known to me ...
